Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Extends the answer time when a major capital improvement rent increase has been filed to ninety days
Summary: Extends the answer time when a major capital improvement rent increase has been filed to ninety days.
LawCode: Amd §§26-511.1, 26-405.1, 26-511 & 26-405, NYC Ad Cd; amd §§10-b & 6, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §§8-a & 4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the emergency housing rent control law and the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to extending the time a tenant shall have to answer when an application for a major capital improvement rent increase has been filed
